verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6881>Zorah<s%>, of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>; and his <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H6135>childless<s%>, and bore <S%H3205>not<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6135>her<s%>, Behold now, you are childless, and <S%H3205>carry<s%> <S%H2029>not<s%>: but you shall conceive, and <S%H3205>carry<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.
Now therefore <S%H8104>beware<s%>, I pray <S%H8354>you<s%>, and drink not <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> not any unclean <S%H2931>thing<s%>:

<S%H2030>For<s%>, behold, you shall conceive, and <S%H3205>carry<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and no <S%H4177>razor<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%>: for the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%>: and he shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H4758>me<s%>, and his look was like the <S%H4758>look<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%>: but I <S%H7592>asked<s%> him not from where he <S%H5046>was<s%>, neither told he me his <S%H8034>name<s%>:

But he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2030>me<s%>, Behold, you shall conceive, and <S%H3205>carry<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and now <S%H7941>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink<s%>, neither <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H5288>thing<s%>: for the child shall be a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>O<s%> my <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H4994>let<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> which you did <S%H7971>send<s%> come <S%H935>again<s%> unto <S%H3384>us<s%>, and teach us what we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto the <S%H5288>child<s%> that shall be <S%H3205>born<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>; and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H935>again<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%> as she <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: but <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> her husband was not with <S%H376>her<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> made <S%H4116>hurry<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%>, and <S%H5046>showed<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, Behold, the man has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H935>me<s%>, that came unto me the other <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H376>him<s%>, Are you the man that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am.
And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Now let your <S%H1697>words<s%> come to <S%H935>pass<s%>. How shall we <S%H4941>raise<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%>, and how shall we treat <S%H4639>him<s%>?
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>, Of all that I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%> let her <S%H8104>beware<s%>.

She may not <S%H398>eat<s%> of any thing that <S%H3318>comes<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, neither let her <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, nor <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H6680>thing<s%>: all that I commanded her let her <S%H8104>observe<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I pray <S%H6113>you<s%>, let us detain <S%H6213>you<s%>, until we shall have made ready a <S%H1423>kid<s%> for <S%H6440>you<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4495>Manoah<s%>, Though you <S%H6113>detain<s%> <S%H398>me<s%>, I will not eat of your <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H6213>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, you must <S%H5927>offer<s%> it unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>. For <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, What is your <S%H8034>name<s%>, that when your <S%H1697>sayings<s%> come to <S%H935>pass<s%> we may do you <S%H3513>honor<s%>?
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7592>him<s%>, Why ask you after my <S%H8034>name<s%>, seeing it is <S%H6383>secret<s%>?

So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> with a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: and the angel <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously<s%>; and <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on<s%>.

For it came to <S%H3851>pass<s%>, when the flame went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven<s%> from off the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> in the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>. And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H7200>on<s%> <S%H5307>it<s%>, and fell on their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> did no <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and to his <S%H802>wife<s%>. Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H802>wife<s%>, We shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, because we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3863>him<s%>, If the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> were <S%H2654>pleased<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H3947>us<s%>, he would not have received a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> at our <S%H3027>hands<s%>, neither would he have <S%H7200>showed<s%> us all these <S%H6256>things<s%>, nor would as at this time have <S%H8085>told<s%> us such things as <S%H2063>these<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%>: and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> blessed <S%H1288>him<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to move him at <S%H6470>times<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%>.
